name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The old chat gpt dark mode

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the background color back to the original.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The new dark mode is too dark. This reverts it back.
Does not affect light mode.
